sep=: Login with valid email and password
column6: 1. Enter valid email address in the email field, 2. Enter valid password in the password field, 3. Click on the "Sign in" button
column7: User is logged in successfully and redirected to the homepage

sep=: Login with invalid email and password
column6: 1. Enter invalid email address in the email field, 2. Enter invalid password in the password field, 3. Click on the "Sign in" button
column7: Error message is displayed indicating invalid email and password

sep=: Login with empty email and password fields
column6: 1. Leave email field empty, 2. Leave password field empty, 3. Click on the "Sign in" button
column7: Error message is displayed indicating that email and password fields cannot be empty

column6: 1. Click on the "Forgot your password?" link, 2. Enter valid email address in the email field, 3. Click on the "Submit" button
column7: Password reset instructions are sent to the user's email address

sep=: Forgot password functionality with invalid email
column6: 1. Click on the "Forgot your password?" link, 2. Enter invalid email address in the email field, 3. Click on the "Submit" button
column7: Error message is displayed indicating that the email address is invalid or not found

column6: 1. Click on the "Create account" button, 2. Enter valid email address in the email field, 3. Enter valid password in the password field, 4. Confirm password, 5. Click on the "Sign up" button
column7: User account is created successfully and user is logged in automatically

sep=: Create account functionality with invalid email
column6: 1. Click on the "Create account" button, 2. Enter invalid email address in the email field, 3. Enter valid password in the password field, 4. Confirm password, 5. Click on the "Sign up" button
column7: Error message is displayed indicating that the email address is invalid

sep=: Create account functionality with weak password
column6: 1. Click on the "Create account" button, 2. Enter valid email address in the email field, 3. Enter weak password in the password field, 4. Confirm password, 5. Click on the "Sign up" button
column7: Error message is displayed indicating that the password is too weak
